member.summary: Represents the placement and properties of a camera in a 3D scene.

member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom factor (percentage). The zoom modifies the scene as a whole and zooms in or out accordingly.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies its input color with the specific opacity, but with its color unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a more or less opaque version of its input color. An alpha modulate never increases the alpha beyond 100%. A 200% alpha modulate makes an input color twice as opaque as before. A 50% alpha modulate makes an input color half as opaque as before.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a more or less opaque version of its input color. Increases or decreases the input alpha percentage by the specified percentage offset.A 10% alpha offset increases a 50% opacity to 60%. A -10% alpha offset decreases a 50% opacity to 40%. The transformed alpha values are limited to a range of 0 to 100%. A 10% alpha offset increase to a 100% opaque object still results in 100% opacity.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BlueColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific blue component, but with the red and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BlueModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its blue component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% blue modulate will reduce the blue component by half. A 200% blue modulate will double the blue component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BlueOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its blue component shifted, but with its red and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ComplementColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies that the color rendered should be the complement of its input color with the complement being defined as such. Two colors are called complementary if, when mixed they produce a shade of gray.
member.example: The complement of red which is RGB (255, 0, 0) is cyan which is RGB (0, 255, 255).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GammaColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies that the output color rendered by the generating application should be the sRGB gamma shift of the input color.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GrayscaleColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a grayscale of its input color, taking into relative intensities of the red, green, and blue primaries.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GreenColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific green component, but with the blue and red color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GreenModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its green component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% green modulate will reduce the green component by half. A 200% green modulate will double the green component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GreenOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its green component shifted, but with its blue and red color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HueColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with the specified hue, but with its saturation and luminance unchanged.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HueColorTransform.Hue
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual angle value to be used with the input color's hue component.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 21600000) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HueModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its hue modulated by the given percentage. A 50% hue modulate decreases the angular hue value by half. A 200% hue modulate doubles the angular hue value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HueOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its hue shifted, but with its saturation and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a color transform that is applied on an input color to produce a new color, without modifying the original one.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.InverseColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the inverse of its input color.
member.example: The inverse of red (1, 0, 0) is cyan (0, 1, 1 ).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.InverseGammaColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies that the output color rendered by the generating application should be the inverse sRGB gamma shift of the input color.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IValueColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a color transform that transforms an integer value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.IValueColorTransform.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LuminanceColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specified luminance, but with its hue and saturation unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LuminanceModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with its luminance modulated by the given percentage. A 50% luminance modulate will reduce the luminance by half. A 200% luminance modulate will double the luminance.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.LuminanceOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its luminance shifted, but with its saturation and hue unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RedColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific red component, but with the blue and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RedModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its red component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% red modulate will reduce the red component by half. A 200% red modulate will double the red component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RedOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its red component shifted, but with its blue and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SaturationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with the specified saturation, but with its hue and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SaturationModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its saturation modulated by the given percentage. A 50% hue modulate decreases the angular saturation value by half. A 200% hue modulate doubles the angular saturation value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SaturationOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its saturation shifted, but with its hue and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ShadeColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a darker version of its input color.
member.example: A 10% tint is 10% of the input color combined with 90% black.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TintColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a lighter version of its input color.
member.example: A 10% tint is 10% of the input color combined with 90% white.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a color transform that affects a single value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueColorTransform.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueModulationColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies a color transform. A modulation will never increases the original value beyond 100%. A 200% modulate doubles the original value, while a 50% modulate takes only half of it.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueModulationColorTransform.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the modulation value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, âˆž) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueOffsetColorTransform
member.summary: Specifies an absolute value that is added to the original value. The shifted values are limited to a range of 0 to 100%.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ValueOffsetColorTransform.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset value.
member.remarks: Only values in [-100000, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.DrawingColor.ColorTransforms
member.summary: Gets the list of color transforms that are applied to the current color.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HslColor.Hue
member.summary: Gets or sets the angular value describing the wavelength.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 21600000) are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HslColor.Luminance
member.summary: Gets or sets the luminance referring to the lightness or darkness of the color. Expressed as a percentage with 0% referring to maximal dark(black) and 100% referring to maximal white.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HslColor.Saturation
member.summary: Gets or sets the saturation referring to the purity of the hue. Expressed as a percentage with 0% referring to grey, 100% referring to the purest form of the hue.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PresetColor
member.summary: Specifies a color which is bound to one of a predefined collection of colors.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PresetColor.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the actual preset color value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbColor
member.summary: Specifies a color using the red, green, blue RGB color model. Each component, red, green, and blue is expressed as a byte value. A perceptual gamma of 2.2 is used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbColor.Red
member.summary: Gets or sets the red value.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbColor.Green
member.summary: Gets or sets the red value.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbColor.Blue
member.summary: Gets or sets the red value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbPercentColor
member.summary: Specifies a color using the red, green, blue RGB color model. Each component, red, green, and blue is expressed as a percentage from 0% to 100%. A linear gamma of 1.0 is assumed.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbPercentColor.Red
member.summary: Gets or sets the red value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbPercentColor.Green
member.summary: Gets or sets the green value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.RgbPercentColor.Blue
member.summary: Gets or sets the blue value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SchemeColor
member.summary: Specifies a color bound to a user's theme. As with all elements which define a color, it is possible to apply a list of color transforms to the base color defined.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SchemeColor.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired scheme value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColor
member.summary: Specifies a system color value. This color is based upon the value that this color currently has within the system on which the document is being viewed.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColor.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the system color value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColor.LastColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a fallback color that should be used if the underlying SystemColor is unknown within the system. It is also the color value that was last computed by the generating application.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaBiLevelEffect
member.summary: Represents an Alpha Bi-Level Effect. Alpha(Opacity) values less than the threshold are changed to 0 (fully transparent) and alpha values greater than or equal to the threshold are changed to 100% (fully opaque).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaBiLevelEffect.Threshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold value for the alpha bi-level effect.
member.remarks: Only positive percent values are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaCeilingEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha ceiling effect. Alpha(opacity) values greater than zero are changed to 100%. In other words, anything partially opaque becomes fully opaque.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaFloorEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha floor effect. Alpha(opacity) values less than 100% are changed to zero. In other words, anything partially transparent becomes fully transparent.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaInsetOutsetEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha outset/inset effect. This is equivalent to an alpha ceiling, followed by alpha blur, followed by either an alpha ceiling(positive radius) or alpha floor(negative radius).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaInsetOutsetEffect.Radius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius of outset/inset.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaInverseEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha inverse effect. Alpha(opacity) values are inverted by subtracting from 100%.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaInverseEffect.EffectColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color that would be affected by the effect.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulateEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha modulate effect. Effect alpha(opacity) values are multiplied by a fixed percentage. The effect container specifies an effect containing alpha values to modulate.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulateEffect.Container
member.summary: Gets the effect container.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulateFixedEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha modulate fixed effect. Effect alpha(opacity) values are multiplied by a fixed percentage.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaModulateFixedEffect.Amount
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage amount to scale the alpha.
member.remarks: Only positive percent values are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaReplceEffect
member.summary: Represents an alpha replace effect. Effect alpha(opacity) values are replaced by a fixed alpha.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.AlphaReplceEffect.Alpha
member.summary: Gets or sets the new opacity value.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BiLevelEffect
member.summary: Represents a bi-level (black/white) effect. Input colors whose luminance is less than the specified threshold value are changed to black. Input colors whose luminance are greater than or equal the specified value are set to white.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BiLevelEffect.Threshold
member.summary: Gets or sets luminance threshold for the Bi-Level effect. Values greater than or equal to the threshold are set to white.Values lesser than the threshold are set to black.
member.remarks: Only positive percent values are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.
Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates how to blend the effects.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.BlendEffect.Effects
member.summary: Gets or sets the effects to blend.

member.summary: Gets or sets the angular value describing the wavelength.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HslEffect.Luminance
member.summary: Gets or sets the luminance referring to the lightness or darkness of the color. Expressed as a percentage with 0% referring to maximal dark(black) and 100% referring to maximal white.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 100000] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.HslEffect.Saturation
member.summary: Gets or sets the saturation referring to the purity of the hue. Expressed as a percentage with 0% referring to grey, 100% referring to the purest form of the hue.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill that is used to decorate the outline.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.DashingScheme
member.summary: Gets or sets the dashing scheme.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.LineJoin
member.summary: Gets or sets the line join properties.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.HeadEndStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the end style that decorates the head of the line.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.TailEndStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the end style that decorates the tail of the line.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.EndLineCap
member.summary: Gets or sets the ending caps that should be used for this line.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.CompoundLineType
member.summary: Gets or sets the compound line type to be used for the underline stroke.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.PenAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment to be used for the underline stroke.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Outline.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width to be used for the underline stroke.
member.remarks: Only values in [0, 20116800] are accepted. Values out of bounds are coerced.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PenAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the pen alignment relative to the path stroke.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PenAlignment.Center
member.summary: Center pen (line drawn at center of path stroke).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PenAlignment.Inset
member.summary: Inset pen (the pen is aligned on the inside of the edge of the path).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PresetDashingScheme
member.summary: Specifies that a preset line dashing scheme should be used.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ConnectionEnd
member.summary: Specifies the star/end of a connection.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ConnectionEnd.ConnectedShapeId
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the shape that this connection will connect to.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ConnectionEnd.ConnectionSiteIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the connection site in shape's connections table.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ConnectionShapeLocks
member.summary: Specifies all functional restrictions applied on a connector shape.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ConnectionSite
member.summary: Specifies a connection site for a shape. A connection site allows a connection shape to be attached to the owning shape.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ConnectionSite.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the connection site.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.ConnectionSite.Angle
member.summary: Gets or sets the incoming connector angle.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue
member.summary: Represents the different system color options.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.Dark3D
member.summary: Specifies a Dark shadow color for three-dimensional display elements.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.Light3D
member.summary: Specifies a Light color for three-dimensional display elements (for edges facing the light source).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.ActiveBorder
member.summary: Specifies an Active Window Border Color.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.ActiveCaption
member.summary: Specifies the active window title bar color. In particular the left side color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar if the gradient effect is enabled.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.ApplicationWorkspace
member.summary: Specifies the Background color of multiple document interface (MDI) applications.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.Background
member.summary: Specifies the desktop background color.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.ButtonFace
member.summary: Specifies the face color for three-dimensional display elements and for dialog box backgrounds.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.ButtonHighlight
member.summary: Specifies the highlight color for three-dimensional display elements (for edges facing the light source).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.ButtonShadow
member.summary: Specifies the shadow color for three-dimensional display elements (for edges facing away from the light source).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.ButtonText
member.summary: Specifies the color of text on push buttons.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.CaptionText
member.summary: Specifies the color of text in the caption, size box, and scroll bar arrow box.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.GradientActiveCaption
member.summary: Specifies the right side color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.GradientInactiveCaption
member.summary: Specifies the right side color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.GrayText
member.summary: Specifies a grayed (disabled) text. This color is set to 0 if the current display driver does not support a solid gray color.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.Highlight
member.summary: Specifies the color of Item(s) selected in a control.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.HighlightText
member.summary: Specifies the text color of item(s) selected in a control.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.HotLight
member.summary: Specifies the color for a hyperlink or hot-tracked item.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.InactiveBorder
member.summary: Specifies the color of the Inactive window border.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.InactiveCaption
member.summary: Specifies the color of the Inactive window caption. Specifies the left side color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar if the gradient effect is enabled.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.InactiveCaptionText
member.summary: Specifies the color of text in an inactive caption.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.InfoBack
member.summary: Specifies the background color for tooltip controls.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.SystemColorValue.InfoText

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TextWrappingType
member.summary: Specifies the text wrapping types.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TextWrappingType.None
member.summary: No wrapping will occur on this text body. Words will spill out without paying attention to the bounding rectangle boundaries.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.TextWrappingType.Square
member.summary: Determines if words are wrapped within the bounding rectangle of the parent DrawingML object.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalOverflowType
member.summary: Specifies the text vertical overflow types.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalOverflowType.Overflow
member.summary: Overflow the text and pay no attention to top and bottom barriers.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalOverflowType.Ellipsis
member.summary: Pay attention to top and bottom barriers. Use an ellipsis to denote that there is text which is not visible.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalOverflowType.Clip
member.summary: Pay attention to top and bottom barriers. Provide no indication that there is text which is not visible.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType
member.summary: Specifies the types of vertical text.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.Horizontal
member.summary: Horizontal text.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.Vertical
member.summary: Determines if all of the text is vertical orientation (each line is 90 degrees rotated clockwise, so it goes from top to bottom; each next line is to the left from the previous one).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.Vertical270
member.summary: Determines if all of the text is vertical orientation (each line is 270 degrees rotated clockwise, so it goes from bottom to top; each next line is to the right from the previous one).

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.WordArtVertical
member.summary: Determines if all of the text is vertical ("one letter on top of another").

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.EastAsianVertical
member.summary: A special version of vertical text, where some fonts are displayed as if rotated by 90 degrees while some fonts (mostly East Asian) are displayed vertical.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.MongolianVertical
member.summary: A special version of vertical text, where some fonts are displayed as if rotated by 90 degrees while some fonts (mostly East Asian) are displayed vertical. The difference between this and the EastAsianVertical is the text flows top down then LEFT to RIGHT, instead of RIGHT to LEFT.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.VerticalTextType.WordArtVerticalRightToLeft
member.summary: Specifies that vertical WordArt should be shown from right to left rather than left to right.

member.summary: Gets the list of effects applied to the picture.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Picture.CompressionState
member.summary: Gets or sets the compression state with which the picture is stored.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Picture.EmbeddedPictureReference
member.summary: Gets or sets the identification information for an embedded picture.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Picture.LinkPictureReference
member.summary: Gets or sets the identification information for a linked picture.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.AlphaColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies its input color with the specific opacity, but with its color unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.AlphaModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a more or less opaque version of its input color. An alpha modulate never increases the alpha beyond 100%. A 200% alpha modulate makes an input color twice as opaque as before. A 50% alpha modulate makes an input color half as opaque as before.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.AlphaOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a more or less opaque version of its input color. Increases or decreases the input alpha percentage by the specified percentage offset.A 10% alpha offset increases a 50% opacity to 60%. A -10% alpha offset decreases a 50% opacity to 40%. The transformed alpha values are limited to a range of 0 to 100%. A 10% alpha offset increase to a 100% opaque object still results in 100% opacity.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.BlueColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific blue component, but with the red and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.BlueModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its blue component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% blue modulate will reduce the blue component by half. A 200% blue modulate will double the blue component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.BlueOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its blue component shifted, but with its red and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ComplementColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies that the color rendered should be the complement of its input color with the complement being defined as such. Two colors are called complementary if, when mixed they produce a shade of grey.
member.example: The complement of red which is RGB (255, 0, 0) is cyan which is RGB (0, 255, 255).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.GammaColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies that the output color rendered by the generating application should be the sRGB gamma shift of the input color.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.GrayscaleColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a grayscale of its input color, taking into relative intensities of the red, green, and blue primaries.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.GreenColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific green component, but with the blue and red color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.GreenOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its green component shifted, but with its blue and red color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.HueColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with the specified hue, but with its saturation and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.HueModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its hue modulated by the given percentage. A 50% hue modulate decreases the angular hue value by half. A 200% hue modulate doubles the angular hue value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.HueOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its hue shifted, but with its saturation and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.InverseColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the inverse of its input color.
member.example: The inverse of red (1, 0, 0) is cyan (0, 1, 1 ).

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.InverseGammaColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies that the output color rendered by the generating application should be the inverse sRGB gamma shift of the input color.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.LuminanceColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specified luminance, but with its hue and saturation unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.LuminanceModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with its luminance modulated by the given percentage. A 50% luminance modulate will reduce the luminance by half. A 200% luminance modulate will double the luminance.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.LuminanceOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its luminance shifted, but with its saturation and hue unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.RedColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with the specific red component, but with the blue and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.RedModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its red component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% red modulate will reduce the red component by half. A 200% red modulate will double the red component.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.RedOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its red component shifted, but with its blue and green color components unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.SaturationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies specifies the input color with the specified saturation, but with its hue and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.SaturationModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its saturation modulated by the given percentage. A 50% hue modulate decreases the angular saturation value by half. A 200% hue modulate doubles the angular saturation value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.SaturationOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its saturation shifted, but with its hue and luminance unchanged.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ShadeColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a darker version of its input color.
member.example: A 10% tint is 10% of the input color combined with 90% black.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.TintColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a lighter version of its input color.
member.example: A 10% tint is 10% of the input color combined with 90% white.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ValueColorTransformBaseContext
member.summary: Specifies a color transform that affects a single value.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ValueModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies a color transform. A modulation will never increases the original value beyond 100%. A 200% modulate doubles the original value, while a 50% modulate takes only half of it.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ValueOffsetColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies an absolute value that is added to the original value. The shifted values are limited to a range of 0 to 100%.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ArcSegment.HeightRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the height radius of the supposed circle being used to draw the arc. This will give the ellipse a total height of (2 * HeightRadius).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ArcSegment.WidthRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the width radius of the supposed circle being used to draw the arc. This will give the ellipse a total width of (2 * WidthRadius).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ArcSegment.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the start angle. It will specify what angle along the supposed circle path will be used as the start position for drawing the arc. This start angle will be locked to the last known pen position in the shape path.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.Model.ArcSegment.SwingAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the swing angle. It will specify how far angle-wise along the supposed circle path the arc will be extended. The extension from the start angle will always be in the clockwise direction around the supposed circle.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.GreenModulationColorTransformContext
member.summary: Specifies the input color with its green component modulated by the given percentage. A 50% green modulate will reduce the green component by half. A 200% green modulate will double the green component.

member.summary: Gets or sets the height radius of the supposed circle being used to draw the arc. This will give the ellipse a total height of (2 * HeightRadius).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PathArc.WidthRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the width radius of the supposed circle being used to draw the arc. This will give the ellipse a total width of (2 * WidthRadius).

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PathArc.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the start angle. It will specify what angle along the supposed circle path will be used as the start position for drawing the arc. This start angle will be locked to the last known pen position in the shape path.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Documents.DrawingML.PathArc.SwingAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the swing angle. It will specify how far angle-wise along the supposed circle path the arc will be extended. The extension from the start angle will always be in the clockwise direction around the supposed circle.
